#summary pywws uploads.

= Introduction =

Upload weather data to pywws.


= Details =

pywws is a stand alone weather station collection and data presenting software. The input data for pywws is a comma separated file of the following format:

2010-03-14 04:55,23.0,23.4,32.0,18.7,991.5,0.0,0.0,270.0,0.3,00<br>
2010-03-14 04:50,23.0,23.4,33.0,18.7,991.5,0.0,0.0,270.0,0.3,00<br>
2010-03-14 04:45,24.0,23.4,33.0,18.7,991.5,0.0,0.0,270.0,0.3,00<br>
2010-03-14 04:40,23.0,23.4,33.0,18.7,991.6,0.0,0.0,270.0,0.3,00<br>
2010-03-14 04:35,24.0,23.5,33.0,18.8,991.6,0.0,0.0,270.0,0.3,00<br>
2010-03-14 04:30,24.0,23.5,33.0,18.8,991.6,0.0,0.0,270.0,0.3,00<br>


The file is stored in /var/pywws.log, and can be uploaded by calling the script /usr/bin/pywws.sh. The script uses FTP for uploading the log file, so the upload script must be updated with the username and password to be used before it is called.

For furher details, please see:

http://pywws.googlecode.com
